iotajust
blocks.content: Soundness justification theorem for ~ df-iota . (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 29-Jun-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm iotajust(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  |- wceq(cuni(cab(s0, wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(s0))))), cuni(cab(s2, wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(s2))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  unieqi(cab(s0, wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(s0)))), cab(s2, wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(s2)))))
  eqtri(cab(s0, wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(s0)))), cab(s2, wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(s2)))), cab(hs0, wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(hs0)))))
  cbvabv(s0, hs0, wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(s0))), wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(hs0))))
  eqeq2d(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(s0)), csn(cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  sneq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  cbvabv(hs0, s2, wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(hs0))), wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(s2))))
  eqeq2d(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(hs0)), csn(cv(s2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s2)))
  sneq(cv(hs0), cv(s2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(hs0)))
  diff.cab.s(s0, s1, w0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(s0))))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(s2))))
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(hs0)))
  diff.cab.s(s2, s1, w0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.csn.s(s2, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iotajust(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ⋃ { s0 | { s1 | w0 } = { s0 } } = ⋃ { s2 | { s1 | w0 } = { s2 } }
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  unieqi({ s0 | { s1 | w0 } = { s0 } }, { s2 | { s1 | w0 } = { s2 } })
  eqtri({ s0 | { s1 | w0 } = { s0 } }, { s2 | { s1 | w0 } = { s2 } }, { hs0 | { s1 | w0 } = { hs0 } })
  cbvabv(s0, hs0, { s1 | w0 } = { s0 }, { s1 | w0 } = { hs0 })
  eqeq2d({ s1 | w0 }, { s0 }, { hs0 }, s0 = hs0)
  sneq(s0, hs0)
  cbvabv(hs0, s2, { s1 | w0 } = { hs0 }, { s1 | w0 } = { s2 })
  eqeq2d({ s1 | w0 }, { hs0 }, { s2 }, hs0 = s2)
  sneq(hs0, s2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, { s1 | w0 }, { hs0 })
  diff.cab.s(s0, s1, w0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w({ s1 | w0 } = { s0 })
  diff.hs0.w({ s1 | w0 } = { s2 })
  diff.wceq.s(s2, { s1 | w0 }, { hs0 })
  diff.cab.s(s2, s1, w0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.csn.s(s2, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: df-iota
blocks.content: Define Russell's definition description binder, which can be read as "the unique ` x ` such that ` ph ` ", where ` ph ` ordinarily contains ` x ` as a free variable. Our definition is meaningful only when there is exactly one ` x ` such that ` ph ` is true (see ~ iotaval ); otherwise, it evaluates to the empty set (see ~ iotanul ). Russell used the inverted iota symbol ` iota ` to represent the binder. Sometimes proofs need to expand an iota-based definition. That is, given "X = the x for which ... x ... x ..." holds, the proof needs to get to "... X ... X ...". A general strategy to do this is to use ~ riotacl2 (or ~ iotacl for unbounded iota), as demonstrated in the proof of ~ supub . This can be easier than applying ~ riotasbc or a version that applies an explicit substitution, because substituting an iota into its own property always has a bound variable clash which must be first renamed or else guarded with NF. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 30-Jun-2011.)

blocks.name: nfiotad
blocks.content: Deduction version of ~ nfiota . (Contributed by NM, 18-Feb-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfiotad(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wnfc(s0, cio(s1, w1)))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w1))
} = {
  nfcxfrd(s0, cio(s1, w1), cuni(cab(hs0, wal(s1, wb(w1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))))), w0)
  dfiota2(s1, hs0, w1)
  nfunid(s0, cab(hs0, wal(s1, wb(w1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))), w0)
  nfabd(s0, hs0, w0, wal(s1, wb(w1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))))
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  nfald2(s0, s1, w0, wb(w1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))
  nfbid(s0, wa(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), w1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  adantr(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, w1))
  adantl(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))
  nfeqf1(s0, s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(w1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfiotad(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (w0 → F/(s0, iota(s1, w1)))
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → F/(s0, w1))
} = {
  nfcxfrd(s0, iota(s1, w1), ⋃ { hs0 | ∀(s1,(w1 ↔ s1 = hs0))}, w0)
  dfiota2(s1, hs0, w1)
  nfunid(s0, { hs0 | ∀(s1,(w1 ↔ s1 = hs0))}, w0)
  nfabd(s0, hs0, w0, ∀(s1,(w1 ↔ s1 = hs0)))
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  nfald2(s0, s1, w0, (w1 ↔ s1 = hs0))
  nfbid(s0, (w0 ∧ ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1)), w1, s1 = hs0)
  adantr(w0, ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), F/(s0, w1))
  adantl(w0, ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), F/(s0, s1 = hs0))
  nfeqf1(s0, s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(w1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: cbviota
blocks.content: Change bound variables in a description binder. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 1-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbviota(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wceq(cio(s0, w0), cio(s1, w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(cio(s0, w0), cio(s1, w1), cuni(cab(hs0, wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))), cuni(cab(hs0, wal(s1, wb(w1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))))))
  unieqi(cab(hs0, wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))), cab(hs0, wal(s1, wb(w1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))))
  abbii(hs0, wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wal(s1, wb(w1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))))
  bitri(wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wal(s1, wb(w1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))), wal(hs1, wb(wsb(hs1, s0, w0), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))
  cbvalv1(s0, hs1, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wb(wsb(hs1, s0, w0), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))
  nfv(hs1, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  nfbi(s0, wsb(hs1, s0, w0), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  nfs1v(s0, hs1, w0)
  nfv(s0, wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wsb(hs1, s0, w0), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  sbequ12(s0, hs1, w0)
  equequ1(s0, hs1, hs0)
  cbvalv1(hs1, s1, wb(wsb(hs1, s0, w0), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), wb(w1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))
  nfbi(s1, wsb(hs1, s0, w0), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  nfsb(s1, hs1, s0, w0)
  nfv(s1, wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  nfv(hs1, wb(w1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wsb(hs1, s0, w0), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), w1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  syl6bb(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wsb(hs1, s0, w0), w1, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
  sbequ(hs1, s1, s0, w0)
  sbie(s1, s0, w0, w1)
  equequ1(hs1, s1, hs0)
  dfiota2(s0, hs0, w0)
  dfiota2(s1, hs0, w1)
  diff.hs1.w(wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs1), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs1.w(wb(w1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(w1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cbviota(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ iota(s0, w0)= iota(s1, w1)
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 →(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w1)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(iota(s0, w0), iota(s1, w1), ⋃ { hs0 | ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))}, ⋃ { hs0 | ∀(s1,(w1 ↔ s1 = hs0))})
  unieqi({ hs0 | ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))}, { hs0 | ∀(s1,(w1 ↔ s1 = hs0))})
  abbii(hs0, ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0)), ∀(s1,(w1 ↔ s1 = hs0)))
  bitri(∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0)), ∀(s1,(w1 ↔ s1 = hs0)), ∀(hs1,([hs1 / s0]w0 ↔ hs1 = hs0)))
  cbvalv1(s0, hs1, (w0 ↔ s0 = hs0), ([hs1 / s0]w0 ↔ hs1 = hs0))
  nfv(hs1, (w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))
  nfbi(s0, [hs1 / s0]w0, hs1 = hs0)
  nfs1v(s0, hs1, w0)
  nfv(s0, hs1 = hs0)
  bibi12d(s0 = hs1, w0, s0 = hs0, [hs1 / s0]w0, hs1 = hs0)
  sbequ12(s0, hs1, w0)
  equequ1(s0, hs1, hs0)
  cbvalv1(hs1, s1, ([hs1 / s0]w0 ↔ hs1 = hs0), (w1 ↔ s1 = hs0))
  nfbi(s1, [hs1 / s0]w0, hs1 = hs0)
  nfsb(s1, hs1, s0, w0)
  nfv(s1, hs1 = hs0)
  nfv(hs1, (w1 ↔ s1 = hs0))
  bibi12d(hs1 = s1, [hs1 / s0]w0, hs1 = hs0, w1, s1 = hs0)
  syl6bb(hs1 = s1, [hs1 / s0]w0, w1, [s1 / s0]w0)
  sbequ(hs1, s1, s0, w0)
  sbie(s1, s0, w0, w1)
  equequ1(hs1, s1, hs0)
  dfiota2(s0, hs0, w0)
  dfiota2(s1, hs0, w1)
  diff.hs1.w((w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs1.w((w1 ↔ s1 = hs0))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(w1)
}

blocks.name: sb8iota
blocks.content: Variable substitution in description binder. Compare ~ sb8eu . (Contributed by NM, 18-Mar-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm sb8iota(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  |- wceq(cio(s0, w0), cio(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(cio(s0, w0), cio(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)), cuni(cab(hs0, wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))), cuni(cab(hs0, wal(s1, wb(wsb(s1, s0, w0), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))))))
  unieqi(cab(hs0, wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))), cab(hs0, wal(s1, wb(wsb(s1, s0, w0), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))))
  abbii(hs0, wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wal(s1, wb(wsb(s1, s0, w0), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))))
  3bitri(wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wal(s1, wb(wsb(s1, s0, w0), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))), wal(hs1, wsb(hs1, s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))), wal(s1, wsb(s1, s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))))
  sb8(s0, hs1, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  nfv(hs1, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  cbvalv1(hs1, s1, wsb(hs1, s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wsb(s1, s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))
  nfxfr(s1, wsb(hs1, s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wb(wsb(hs1, s0, w0), wsb(hs1, s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))
  sbbi(hs1, s0, w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  nfbi(s1, wsb(hs1, s0, w0), wsb(hs1, s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  nfsb(s1, hs1, s0, w0)
  nfxfr(s1, wsb(hs1, s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  equsb3(hs1, s0, hs0)
  nfv(s1, wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  nfv(hs1, wsb(s1, s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))
  sbequ(hs1, s1, s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  albii(s1, wsb(s1, s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wb(wsb(s1, s0, w0), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))
  sblbis(s1, s0, w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  equsb3(s1, s0, hs0)
  dfiota2(s0, hs0, w0)
  dfiota2(s1, hs0, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
  diff.hs1.w(wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs1), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs1.w(wsb(s1, s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wsb(s1, s0, w0))
}

thm sb8iota(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ iota(s0, w0)= iota(s1,[s1 / s0]w0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(iota(s0, w0), iota(s1,[s1 / s0]w0), ⋃ { hs0 | ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))}, ⋃ { hs0 | ∀(s1,([s1 / s0]w0 ↔ s1 = hs0))})
  unieqi({ hs0 | ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))}, { hs0 | ∀(s1,([s1 / s0]w0 ↔ s1 = hs0))})
  abbii(hs0, ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0)), ∀(s1,([s1 / s0]w0 ↔ s1 = hs0)))
  3bitri(∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0)), ∀(s1,([s1 / s0]w0 ↔ s1 = hs0)), ∀(hs1,[hs1 / s0](w0 ↔ s0 = hs0)), ∀(s1,[s1 / s0](w0 ↔ s0 = hs0)))
  sb8(s0, hs1, (w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))
  nfv(hs1, (w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))
  cbvalv1(hs1, s1, [hs1 / s0](w0 ↔ s0 = hs0), [s1 / s0](w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))
  nfxfr(s1, [hs1 / s0](w0 ↔ s0 = hs0), ([hs1 / s0]w0 ↔[hs1 / s0]s0 = hs0))
  sbbi(hs1, s0, w0, s0 = hs0)
  nfbi(s1, [hs1 / s0]w0, [hs1 / s0]s0 = hs0)
  nfsb(s1, hs1, s0, w0)
  nfxfr(s1, [hs1 / s0]s0 = hs0, hs1 = hs0)
  equsb3(hs1, s0, hs0)
  nfv(s1, hs1 = hs0)
  nfv(hs1, [s1 / s0](w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))
  sbequ(hs1, s1, s0, (w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))
  albii(s1, [s1 / s0](w0 ↔ s0 = hs0), ([s1 / s0]w0 ↔ s1 = hs0))
  sblbis(s1, s0, w0, s0 = hs0, s1 = hs0)
  equsb3(s1, s0, hs0)
  dfiota2(s0, hs0, w0)
  dfiota2(s1, hs0, [s1 / s0]w0)
  diff.hs1.w((w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs1.w([s1 / s0](w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w([s1 / s0]w0)
}

blocks.name: iotaeq
blocks.content: Equality theorem for descriptions. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 30-Jun-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm iotaeq(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cio(s0, w0), cio(s1, w0)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cio(s0, w0), cio(s1, w0), cuni(cab(hs0, wceq(cab(s0, w0), csn(cv(hs0))))), cuni(cab(hs0, wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(hs0))))), wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  unieqd(cab(hs0, wceq(cab(s0, w0), csn(cv(hs0)))), cab(hs0, wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(hs0)))), wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  abbidv(hs0, wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cab(s0, w0), csn(cv(hs0))), wceq(cab(s1, w0), csn(cv(hs0))))
  eqeq1d(cab(s0, w0), csn(cv(hs0)), cab(s1, w0), wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  eqrdv(hs0, cab(s0, w0), cab(s1, w0), wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  3bitr4g(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cab(s0, w0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cab(s1, w0)), wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wsb(hs0, s1, w0))
  drsb1(s0, s1, hs0, w0)
  df-clab(hs0, s0, w0)
  df-clab(hs0, s1, w0)
  df-iota(s0, hs0, w0)
  df-iota(s1, hs0, w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  diff.hs0.c(cab(s0, w0))
  diff.hs0.c(cab(s1, w0))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

thm iotaeq(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0, s0 = s1)→ iota(s0, w0)= iota(s1, w0))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(iota(s0, w0), iota(s1, w0), ⋃ { hs0 | { s0 | w0 } = { hs0 } }, ⋃ { hs0 | { s1 | w0 } = { hs0 } }, ∀(s0, s0 = s1))
  unieqd({ hs0 | { s0 | w0 } = { hs0 } }, { hs0 | { s1 | w0 } = { hs0 } }, ∀(s0, s0 = s1))
  abbidv(hs0, ∀(s0, s0 = s1), { s0 | w0 } = { hs0 }, { s1 | w0 } = { hs0 })
  eqeq1d({ s0 | w0 }, { hs0 }, { s1 | w0 }, ∀(s0, s0 = s1))
  eqrdv(hs0, { s0 | w0 }, { s1 | w0 }, ∀(s0, s0 = s1))
  3bitr4g(∀(s0, s0 = s1), hs0 ∈ { s0 | w0 }, hs0 ∈ { s1 | w0 }, [hs0 / s0]w0, [hs0 / s1]w0)
  drsb1(s0, s1, hs0, w0)
  df-clab(hs0, s0, w0)
  df-clab(hs0, s1, w0)
  df-iota(s0, hs0, w0)
  df-iota(s1, hs0, w0)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0, s0 = s1))
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 | w0 })
  diff.hs0.c({ s1 | w0 })
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

thm iotabi(setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1) {

} = {

  unieqd(cab(hs0, wceq(cab(s0, w0), csn(cv(hs0)))), cab(hs0, wceq(cab(s0, w1), csn(cv(hs0)))), wal(s0, wb(w0, w1)))
  abbidv(hs0, wal(s0, wb(w0, w1)), wceq(cab(s0, w0), csn(cv(hs0))), wceq(cab(s0, w1), csn(cv(hs0))))
  eqeq1d(cab(s0, w0), csn(cv(hs0)), cab(s0, w1), wal(s0, wb(w0, w1)))
  biimpi(wal(s0, wb(w0, w1)), wceq(cab(s0, w0), cab(s0, w1)))

  df-iota(s0, hs0, w0)
  df-iota(s0, hs0, w1)
  diff.hs0.w(wal(s0, wb(w0, w1)))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w1)

blocks.name: uniabio
blocks.content: Part of Theorem 8.17 in [Quine] p. 56. This theorem serves as a lemma for the fundamental property of iota. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 11-Jul-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm uniabio(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cuni(cab(s0, w0)), cv(s1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  syl6eq(cuni(cab(s0, w0)), cv(s1), cuni(csn(cv(s1))), wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  unieqd(cab(s0, w0), csn(cv(s1)), wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  syl6eqr(cab(s0, w0), csn(cv(s1)), cab(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  biimpi(wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cab(s0, w0), cab(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  abbi(s0, w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  df-sn(s0, cv(s1))
  unisn(cv(s1))
  vex(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm uniabio(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = s1))→ ⋃ { s0 | w0 } = s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  syl6eq(⋃ { s0 | w0 }, s1, ⋃ { s1 }, ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = s1)))
  unieqd({ s0 | w0 }, { s1 }, ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = s1)))
  syl6eqr({ s0 | w0 }, { s1 }, { s0 | s0 = s1 }, ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = s1)))
  biimpi(∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = s1)), { s0 | w0 } = { s0 | s0 = s1 })
  abbi(s0, w0, s0 = s1)
  df-sn(s0, s1)
  unisn(s1)
  vex(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: iotaval
blocks.content: Theorem 8.19 in [Quine] p. 57. This theorem is the fundamental property of iota. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 11-Jul-2011.)

thm iotaval(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cio(s0, w0), cv(s1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  syl5eq(cio(s0, w0), cv(s1), cuni(cab(hs0, wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))), wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  dfiota2(s0, hs0, w0)
  syl(wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cuni(cab(hs0, wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))), cv(s1)), wal(hs0, wb(wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))
  alrimiv(hs0, wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wb(wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))
  syl6bb(wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  impbid(wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  ex(wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  elv(s1, wi(wa(wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))
  sbeqalb(s0, cv(s1), universe, cv(hs0), w0)
  com12(wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))
  alimdv(s0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  biimpd(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  bibi2d(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  equequ2(s1, hs0, s0)
  equcom(s1, hs0)
  uniabio(hs0, s1, wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iotaval(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = s1))→ iota(s0, w0)= s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  syl5eq(iota(s0, w0), s1, ⋃ { hs0 | ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))}, ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = s1)))
  dfiota2(s0, hs0, w0)
  syl(∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = s1)), ⋃ { hs0 | ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))} = s1, ∀(hs0,(∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))↔ hs0 = s1)))
  alrimiv(hs0, ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = s1)), (∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))↔ hs0 = s1))
  syl6bb(∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = s1)), ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0)), hs0 = s1, s1 = hs0)
  impbid(∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = s1)), ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0)), s1 = hs0)
  ex(∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = s1)), ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0)), s1 = hs0)
  elv(s1, ((∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = s1))∧ ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0)))→ s1 = hs0))
  sbeqalb(s0, s1, universe, hs0, w0)
  com12(∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = s1)), s1 = hs0, ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0)))
  alimdv(s0, s1 = hs0, (w0 ↔ s0 = s1), (w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))
  biimpd(s1 = hs0, (w0 ↔ s0 = s1), (w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))
  bibi2d(s1 = hs0, w0, s0 = s1, s0 = hs0)
  equequ2(s1, hs0, s0)
  equcom(s1, hs0)
  uniabio(hs0, s1, ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0)))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = s1)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

  sylbi(weu(s0, w0), wb(w0, wceq(cio(s0, w0), cv(s0))), wex(hs0, wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))))

  bitr4d(wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), w0, wceq(cv(s0), cio(s0, w0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))

  abbi(hs0, wn(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))), wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))
  uni0()
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

thm iotanul(setvar s0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (¬ ∃!(s0, w0)→ iota(s0, w0)= ∅)
} = {
  sylnbi(∃!(s0, w0), iota(s0, w0)= ∅, ∃(hs0, ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))))
  eu6(s0, hs0, w0)
  syl5eq(iota(s0, w0), emptycls, ⋃ { hs0 | ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))}, ¬ ∃(hs0, ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))))
  dfiota2(s0, hs0, w0)
  syl6eq(⋃ { hs0 | ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))}, emptycls, ⋃ ∅, ¬ ∃(hs0, ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))))
  unieqd({ hs0 | ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))}, emptycls, ¬ ∃(hs0, ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))))
  sylbir(¬ ∃(hs0, ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))), { hs0 | ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))} = ∅, ∀(hs0, ¬ ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))))
  alnex(hs0, ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0)))
  syl5req({ hs0 | ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))}, emptycls, { hs0 | ¬ hs0 = hs0 }, ∀(hs0, ¬ ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))))
  dfnul2(hs0)
  sylib(∀(hs0, ¬ ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))), { hs0 | ¬ hs0 = hs0 } = { hs0 | ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))}, ∀(hs0,(¬ hs0 = hs0 ↔ ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0)))))
  alimi(hs0, ¬ ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0)), (¬ hs0 = hs0 ↔ ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))))
  con1bid(¬ ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0)), hs0 = hs0, ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0)))
  biimpi(¬ ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0)), (¬ ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))↔ hs0 = hs0))
  tbt(¬ ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0)), hs0 = hs0)
  equid(hs0)
  abbi(hs0, ¬ hs0 = hs0, ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0)))
  uni0()
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

  eximi(hs0, wal(s0, wb(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cio(s0, w0)))

thm iotaex(setvar s0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ iota(s0, w0)∈ 𝕌
} = {
  pm2.61i(iota(s0, w0)∈ 𝕌, ∃!(s0, w0))
  3imtr4i(∃!(s0, w0), iota(s0, w0)∈ 𝕌, ∃(hs0, ∀(s0,(w0 ↔ s0 = hs0))), ∃(hs0, hs0 = iota(s0, w0)))

blocks.name: iota5
blocks.content: A method for computing iota. (Contributed by NM, 17-Sep-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm iota5(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(cio(s0, w1), c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wb(w1, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpd(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(cio(s0, w1), c0), wal(s0, wb(w1, wceq(cv(s0), c0))))
  alrimiv(s0, wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wb(w1, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wi(wal(s0, wb(w1, wceq(cv(s0), c0))), wceq(cio(s0, w1), c0)))
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, wi(wal(s0, wb(w1, wceq(cv(s0), c0))), wceq(cio(s0, w1), c0)), wi(wal(s0, wb(w1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wceq(cio(s0, w1), cv(hs0))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wal(s0, wb(w1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wceq(cio(s0, w1), cv(hs0)), wal(s0, wb(w1, wceq(cv(s0), c0))), wceq(cio(s0, w1), c0))
  albidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(w1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wb(w1, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  bibi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), w1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  eqeq2(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))
  eqeq2(cv(hs0), c0, cio(s0, w1))
  iotaval(s0, hs0, w1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wal(s0, wb(w1, wceq(cv(s0), c0))), wceq(cio(s0, w1), c0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iota5(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ ((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1)→ iota(s0, w1)= c0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1)→(w1 ↔ s0 = c0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpd((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1), iota(s0, w1)= c0, ∀(s0,(w1 ↔ s0 = c0)))
  alrimiv(s0, (w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1), (w1 ↔ s0 = c0))
  adantl(w0, c0 ∈ c1, (∀(s0,(w1 ↔ s0 = c0))→ iota(s0, w1)= c0))
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, (∀(s0,(w1 ↔ s0 = c0))→ iota(s0, w1)= c0), (∀(s0,(w1 ↔ s0 = hs0))→ iota(s0, w1)= hs0))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c0, ∀(s0,(w1 ↔ s0 = hs0)), iota(s0, w1)= hs0, ∀(s0,(w1 ↔ s0 = c0)), iota(s0, w1)= c0)
  albidv(s0, hs0 = c0, (w1 ↔ s0 = hs0), (w1 ↔ s0 = c0))
  bibi2d(hs0 = c0, w1, s0 = hs0, s0 = c0)
  eqeq2(hs0, c0, s0)
  eqeq2(hs0, c0, iota(s0, w1))
  iotaval(s0, hs0, w1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, c0 ∈ c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((∀(s0,(w1 ↔ s0 = c0))→ iota(s0, w1)= c0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: iota2df
blocks.content: A condition that allows us to represent "the unique element such that ` ph ` " with a class expression ` A ` . (Contributed by NM, 30-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm iota2df(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(w1, wceq(cio(s0, w2), c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, weu(s0, w2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wb(w2, w1))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w1))
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c0))
} = {
  vtocldf(s0, c0, c1, w0, wb(w1, wceq(cio(s0, w2), c0)), wb(w2, wceq(cio(s0, w2), cv(s0))))
  bibi12d(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), w2, wceq(cio(s0, w2), cv(s0)), w1, wceq(cio(s0, w2), c0))
  eqeq2d(cio(s0, w2), cv(s0), c0, wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  simpr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  syl(w0, wb(w2, wceq(cio(s0, w2), cv(s0))), weu(s0, w2))
  iota1(s0, w2)
  nfbid(s0, w0, w1, wceq(cio(s0, w2), c0))
  nfeqd(s0, cio(s0, w2), c0, w0)
  a1i(w0, wnfc(s0, cio(s0, w2)))
  nfiota1(s0, w2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iota2df(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(w1 ↔ iota(s0, w2)= c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∃!(s0, w2))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 = c0)→(w2 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → F/(s0, w1))
  ⊣ (w0 → F/(s0, c0))
} = {
  vtocldf(s0, c0, c1, w0, (w1 ↔ iota(s0, w2)= c0), (w2 ↔ iota(s0, w2)= s0))
  bibi12d((w0 ∧ s0 = c0), w2, iota(s0, w2)= s0, w1, iota(s0, w2)= c0)
  eqeq2d(iota(s0, w2), s0, c0, (w0 ∧ s0 = c0))
  simpr(w0, s0 = c0)
  syl(w0, (w2 ↔ iota(s0, w2)= s0), ∃!(s0, w2))
  iota1(s0, w2)
  nfbid(s0, w0, w1, iota(s0, w2)= c0)
  nfeqd(s0, iota(s0, w2), c0, w0)
  a1i(w0, F/(s0, iota(s0, w2)))
  nfiota1(s0, w2)
}

blocks.name: iota2
blocks.content: The unique element such that ` ph ` . (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 1-Jun-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm iota2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), weu(s0, w0)), wb(w1, wceq(cio(s0, w0), c0)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
} = {
  sylan(wcel(c0, c1), weu(s0, w0), wb(w1, wceq(cio(s0, w0), c0)), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  iota2df(s0, c0, universe, wa(wcel(c0, universe), weu(s0, w0)), w1, w0)
  simpl(wcel(c0, universe), weu(s0, w0))
  simpr(wcel(c0, universe), weu(s0, w0))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, universe), weu(s0, w0)), wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))
  nfan(s0, wcel(c0, universe), weu(s0, w0))
  nfv(s0, wcel(c0, universe))
  nfeu1(s0, w0)
  nfvd(s0, wa(wcel(c0, universe), weu(s0, w0)), w1)
  nfcvd(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c0, universe), weu(s0, w0)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iota2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∃!(s0, w0))→(w1 ↔ iota(s0, w0)= c0))
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 →(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w1)
} = {
  sylan(c0 ∈ c1, ∃!(s0, w0), (w1 ↔ iota(s0, w0)= c0), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  elex(c0, c1)
  iota2df(s0, c0, universe, (c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ ∃!(s0, w0)), w1, w0)
  simpl(c0 ∈ 𝕌, ∃!(s0, w0))
  simpr(c0 ∈ 𝕌, ∃!(s0, w0))
  adantl((c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ ∃!(s0, w0)), s0 = c0, (w0 ↔ w1))
  nfan(s0, c0 ∈ 𝕌, ∃!(s0, w0))
  nfv(s0, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  nfeu1(s0, w0)
  nfvd(s0, (c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ ∃!(s0, w0)), w1)
  nfcvd(s0, c0, (c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ ∃!(s0, w0)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

thm sniota(setvar s0, wff w0) {

} = {
  eqrd(s0, cab(s0, w0), csn(cio(s0, w0)), weu(s0, w0))
  nfeu1(s0, w0)
  nfab1(s0, w0)
  nfsn(s0, cio(s0, w0))
  nfiota1(s0, w0)
  3bitr4g(weu(s0, w0), wcel(cv(s0), cab(s0, w0)), wcel(cv(s0), csn(cio(s0, w0))), w0, wceq(cv(s0), cio(s0, w0)))
  syl6bb(weu(s0, w0), w0, wceq(cv(s0), cio(s0, w0)), wceq(cio(s0, w0), cv(s0)))
  iota1(s0, w0)

thm sniota(setvar s0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (∃!(s0, w0)→ { s0 | w0 } = { iota(s0, w0)})
} = {
  eqrd(s0, { s0 | w0 }, { iota(s0, w0)}, ∃!(s0, w0))
  nfeu1(s0, w0)
  nfab1(s0, w0)
  nfsn(s0, iota(s0, w0))
  nfiota1(s0, w0)
  3bitr4g(∃!(s0, w0), s0 ∈ { s0 | w0 }, s0 ∈ { iota(s0, w0)}, w0, s0 = iota(s0, w0))
  syl6bb(∃!(s0, w0), w0, s0 = iota(s0, w0), iota(s0, w0)= s0)
  iota1(s0, w0)
  eqcom(iota(s0, w0), s0)
  abid(s0, w0)
  velsn(s0, iota(s0, w0))
}

thm csbiota(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wceq(csb(s0, c0, cio(s1, w0)), cio(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(csb(s0, c0, cio(s1, w0)), cio(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))), wcel(c0, universe))
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, universe, wceq(csb(s0, c0, cio(s1, w0)), cio(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), cio(s1, w0)), cio(s1, wsb(hs0, s0, w0))))
  eqeq12d(csb(s0, cv(hs0), cio(s1, w0)), cio(s1, wsb(hs0, s0, w0)), csb(s0, c0, cio(s1, w0)), cio(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), c0, cio(s1, w0))
  iotabidv(s1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
  dfsbcq2(hs0, s0, c0, w0)
  csbief(s0, cv(hs0), cio(s1, w0), cio(s1, wsb(hs0, s0, w0)))
  vex(hs0)
  nfiota(s0, s1, wsb(hs0, s0, w0))
  nfs1v(s0, hs0, w0)
  iotabidv(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wsb(hs0, s0, w0))
  sbequ12(s0, hs0, w0)
  eqtr4d(csb(s0, c0, cio(s1, w0)), cio(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  csbprc(s0, c0, cio(s1, w0))
  3syl(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wceq(cio(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), emptycls), wn(wex(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))), wn(weu(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))))
  nexdv(s1, wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
  con3i(wcel(c0, universe), wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
  sbcex(s0, c0, w0)
  con3i(wex(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), weu(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))
  euex(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
  iotanul(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(csb(s0, c0, cio(s1, w0)), cio(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wn.s(s1, wcel(c0, universe))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm csbiota(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ [c0 / s0]iota(s1, w0)= iota(s1,[c0 / s0]w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  pm2.61i([c0 / s0]iota(s1, w0)= iota(s1,[c0 / s0]w0), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, universe, [c0 / s0]iota(s1, w0)= iota(s1,[c0 / s0]w0), [hs0 / s0]iota(s1, w0)= iota(s1,[hs0 / s0]w0))
  eqeq12d([hs0 / s0]iota(s1, w0), iota(s1,[hs0 / s0]w0), [c0 / s0]iota(s1, w0), iota(s1,[c0 / s0]w0), hs0 = c0)
  csbeq1(s0, hs0, c0, iota(s1, w0))
  iotabidv(s1, hs0 = c0, [hs0 / s0]w0, [c0 / s0]w0)
  dfsbcq2(hs0, s0, c0, w0)
  csbief(s0, hs0, iota(s1, w0), iota(s1,[hs0 / s0]w0))
  vex(hs0)
  nfiota(s0, s1, [hs0 / s0]w0)
  nfs1v(s0, hs0, w0)
  iotabidv(s1, s0 = hs0, w0, [hs0 / s0]w0)
  sbequ12(s0, hs0, w0)
  eqtr4d([c0 / s0]iota(s1, w0), iota(s1,[c0 / s0]w0), emptycls, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  csbprc(s0, c0, iota(s1, w0))
  3syl(¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌, iota(s1,[c0 / s0]w0)= ∅, ¬ ∃(s1,[c0 / s0]w0), ¬ ∃!(s1,[c0 / s0]w0))
  nexdv(s1, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌, [c0 / s0]w0)
  con3i(c0 ∈ 𝕌, [c0 / s0]w0)
  sbcex(s0, c0, w0)
  con3i(∃(s1,[c0 / s0]w0), ∃!(s1,[c0 / s0]w0))
  euex(s1, [c0 / s0]w0)
  iotanul(s1, [c0 / s0]w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w([c0 / s0]iota(s1, w0)= iota(s1,[c0 / s0]w0))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wn.s(s1, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}
